targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  ic_node_name,
  ic_node_id,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND request_type != ''
GROUP BY
  t,
  ic_node_name,
  ic_node_id
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 300) * 300) * 1000 as t,
  ic_node_name,
  ic_node_id,
  count() /(300000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.ic_boundary
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1718193133) AND date <= toDateTime(1718279533)
  AND env = 'PROD'
  AND request_type != ''
GROUP BY
  t,
  ic_node_name,
  ic_node_id
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  status,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 300) * 300) * 1000 as t,
  status,
  count() /(300000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.ic_boundary
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1718193178) AND date <= toDateTime(1718279578)
  AND env = 'PROD'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  toInt16(status/100)*100 as status,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 300) * 300) * 1000 as t,
  toInt16(status/100)*100 as status,
  count() /(300000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.ic_boundary
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1718193255) AND date <= toDateTime(1718279655)
  AND env = 'PROD'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Requests Per Second By Status Group

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  if(cache_status == '', 'UNKNOWN', cache_status) as cache_status,
  count() / ($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  cache_status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 300) * 300) * 1000 as t,
  if(cache_status == '', 'UNKNOWN', cache_status) as cache_status,
  count() / (300000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.ic_boundary
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1718194028) AND date <= toDateTime(1718280428)
  AND env = 'PROD'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  cache_status
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  error_cause,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND error_cause NOT IN ('', 'none')
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  error_cause
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=API Boundary Node Overview, user=0 */
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(undefined), 5) * 5) * 1000 as t,
  error_cause,
  count() /(5000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.ic_boundary
WHERE
  undefined >= toDateTime(1738748534) AND undefined <= toDateTime(1738752134)
  AND env = 'PROD'
  AND error_cause NOT IN ('', 'none')
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  error_cause
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  subnet_id,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND subnet_id != ''
GROUP BY
  t,
  subnet_id
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 300) * 300) * 1000 as t,
  subnet_id,
  count() /(300000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.ic_boundary
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1718193700) AND date <= toDateTime(1718280100)
  AND env = 'PROD'
  AND subnet_id != ''
GROUP BY
  t,
  subnet_id
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
WITH busy_canisters AS (
  SELECT
    canister_id
  FROM
    $table
  WHERE
    date >= ($__to - ($__to - $__from)/2)/1000 - 900
    AND date <= ($__to + ($__to - $__from)/2)/1000 + 900
    AND env = '${env}'
    AND canister_id != ''
  GROUP BY
    canister_id
  ORDER BY
    count(*) DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  canister_id,
  count(*) /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND canister_id GLOBAL IN (SELECT canister_id FROM busy_canisters)
GROUP BY
  t,
  canister_id
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
WITH busy_canisters AS (
  SELECT
    canister_id
  FROM
    default.ic_boundary
  WHERE
    date >= (1718280103424 - (1718280103424 - 1718193703424)/2)/1000 - 900
    AND date <= (1718280103424 + (1718280103424 - 1718193703424)/2)/1000 + 900
    AND env = 'PROD'
    AND canister_id != ''
  GROUP BY
    canister_id
  ORDER BY
    count(*) DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 300) * 300) * 1000 as t,
  canister_id,
  count(*) /(300000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.ic_boundary
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1718193798) AND date <= toDateTime(1718280198)
  AND env = 'PROD'
  AND canister_id GLOBAL IN (SELECT canister_id FROM busy_canisters)
GROUP BY
  t,
  canister_id
ORDER BY t
